HomeWiki:
Liber

The Dynamic library Ebooks(media) manager
Managing Ebook or related Files under different Tags and properties

High sens of usability, very easy, relaxed, interactive User Interface...

The Power to share Libers (books and related ...) among the internet under PUBLIC TAGS...
Giving advantges of Easy category folding, letting collegues and all kind of students and users Sharing and Searching
Under PUBLIC TAGS of (personal notes) courses names, specialisations(Math, Physics, Engineering, Literature, Medicine) manuals, books language/regions tags ...
PRIVATE TAGS libers are not shared.

websites, designers...
to Discuss different parts of LIBER process... from designs to data structures, classes, accounting and connectivity, maybe we will use P2P,
maybe other way of sharing... cloud computing, servers ...
